name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: “Please don’t wear the same uniform you wear when you beat us at protests, and shoot our neighbors, to this celebration. If you are going to attend, please pick a different outfit.” That’s what they’re flipping out over. Aren’t you glad they’re armed, and by your tax dollars?
content.value:
“Please don’t wear the same uniform you wear when you beat us at protests, and shoot our neighbors, to this celebration. If you are going to attend, please pick a different outfit.”

That’s what they’re flipping out over.

Aren’t you glad they’re armed, and by your tax dollars?
